detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract UBUToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UBUToken.sol#73-139) has payable functions:
	 - UBUToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UBUToken.sol#131-133)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
